channel.title: Kindle on Tristan Berchoux
channel.description: Recent content in Kindle on Tristan Berchoux

item.title: Kindle Fire and Machine Learning
item.description: Amazon released it’s new iPad competitor, the Kindle Fire, today. A quick read through the description shows it has some interesting features, including a custom-built web browser called Silk. One innovation that they claim is that the browser works in conjunction with Amazon’s EC2 cloud computing platform to speed up the web-surfing experience by doing some computing on your end and some on their end. Seems cool, if it really does make things faster.
